org.openimaj.tools.cbir

Class VLADBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.tools.cbir.VLADBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VLADIndexerBuilder

    public class VLADBuilder
extends Object
    Tool to build a VLAD object and serialise it to a file.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
